Key Match Events: England won the fourth match by 34 runs.
Moeen Ali was named Player-of-the-Match for his all-round performance.
Moeen Ali took 2-28 and scored 63 off 28 balls.
Jason Holder had another fine all-round performance, scoring 36 from 24 balls and taking 3-44.
Kyle Mayers and Brandon King had an opening stand of 64 runs.
Nicholas Pooran hit a massive six that sailed 111 metres.
Post-Match Reflections: Kieron Pollard reflected on the match, stating that they had a chance but slowed down in the middle overs and the target of 194 was just out of reach.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series is level at 2-2 with the final match set to be played on Sunday.
The series has seen an average of 20 sixes per match, with a total of 80 sixes so far.
